comments.body: This will be confusing. There is going to be a Gluster REST service to communicate to glusterd and then there is Heketi, the RESTful volume manager for Gluster.  I think all of these values should be renamed to heketiXXX instead of restXXX to avoid confusion.
I chose the generic name here, so that we can use it even if there is a replacement in future.
